attributes.action: Create National, Regional and/or Local Vulnerable People Database,
attributes.additional_details:
Create National, Regional and/or Local Vulnerable People Database, for chronically ill and disabled people, elderly residents, plus Children with Special Needs and/or Young People with Disabilities. Ask for a free MP’s debate in the House of Common’s, over Creating National, Regional and/or Local Vulnerable People Database.

WHICH AUTHORISED ORGANISATION’s CAN ACCESS THIS VULNERABLE PEOPLE DATABASE, WHEN REACTING TO ANY TYPE OF NATURAL OR NON-NATURAL EMERGENCY, FOR THE SAFETY AND WELBEING OF THE VULNERABLE PEOPLE.

SADLY AUTHORITIES ARE FAILING THE SAFETY AND WELFARE OF VULNERABLE PEOPLE, BECAUSE THEY DO NOT KNOW WHERE WE ARE LIVING IT SEEMS?.WHICH IS BECOMING MORE WORRYING CONCERN NOW, THE COALITION MINISTER DO NOT REALISE THIS OR ADDRESSING THIS PROBLEM TOO?.

SO WITH THE COALITION GOVERNMNET, NOW GOING TO PLACE MORE VULNERABLE PEOPLE TO LIVE IN THE COMMUNITY TOO, THIS PROBLEM, OF WHERE DO THE VULNERABLE PEOPLE LIVE, IS ALL THE MORE IMPORTANT NOW!.
